table_4_2_pathway_definitions.label: RNA Metabolism
table_4_2_pathway_definitions.mechanism: RNA processing defects, stress granule dysregulation, nuclear transport failure

table_4_2_pathway_definitions.label: Cytoskeletal/Axonal
table_4_2_pathway_definitions.mechanism: Microtubule instability, motor protein dysfunction, axonal transport failure

table_4_2_pathway_definitions.label: Mitochondrial
table_4_2_pathway_definitions.mechanism: Mitochondrial dysfunction, ROS accumulation, energy deficit

table_4_2_pathway_definitions.label: Excitotoxicity
table_4_2_pathway_definitions.mechanism: Glutamate toxicity, calcium dysregulation, AMPA/NMDA receptor dysfunction

table_4_2_pathway_definitions.label: DNA Damage
table_4_2_pathway_definitions.mechanism: DNA repair defects, R-loop accumulation, genomic instability
